name: Scratch Cups
description:
Each Scratch Cup is handmade in Brookyln, New York in a small Bedstuy studio by Workaday Handmade. These hand thrown earthenware cups with a blue underglaze began as a playful mistake, but ended up a very happy accident. Cups hold 8oz when filled to the very top.

Please allow for slight variation in the blue marks as no two pieces are exactly alike. Cups are beautiful when paired with the Confetti Bowl, also by Workaday Handmade. These pieces are microwave and food safe. We do recommend hand washing for longevity.

name: Edna Dress
description: The Edna Dress is handmade by Rebe from Japanese cotton. This patchwork jumper is pieced together with soft solid double gauze fabrics. It features a side zipper and side pockets. Simply machine wash a dry. Model is shown wearing an XS dress.

name: Yellow Dot Wren Dress
description:
The Wren Dress is handmade by Rebe from white piqué and Japanese cotton. This flowing wrap dress pulls over the head, wraps in back, and ties in front or back. Other details include a faux button at back neck and hidden front pockets. 

Model is shown wearing an XS dress over the Oscar Pant. Oscar Pant is sold separately.

name: Indigo Malta Vest
description:
The Malta Vest is handmade by Rebe from Japanese indigo cotton with a contrast green check. This sculptural pocket vest looks like a garment but functions like a bag. It features two large side pockets with a hidden zipper pocket on the left and a cell phone pocket on the right. The Malta vest buttons in the front across the the chest and is an amazing carry all. 

Shown on model over the Bertie Dress and Dorothy Skirt. The Bertie Dress and Dorothy Skirt are sold separately.

name: Bertie Dress
description:
The Bertie Dress is made from striped Japanese cotton. This striking dress has a drawstring neckline, pleats in back, triangle inserts in sides, and side pockets with stitching. The Bertie Dress is beautiful worn alone or layered. 

Model is shown wearing a small dress over the Dorothy Skirt. The Dorothy Skirt is sold separately.

name: Confetti Bowl
description:
Each Confetti Bowl is handmade in Brookyln, New York in a small Bedstuy studio by Workaday Handmade. These hand thrown earthenware bowls with a blue underglaze began as a playful mistake, but ended up a very happy accident. 

Please allow for slight variation in the blue glaze as no two pieces are exactly alike. Bowls are beautiful when paired with the Scratch Cups also by Workaday Handmade. These pieces are microwave and food safe. We do recommend hand washing for longevity.

name: White Dot Mug
description: Each Dot Mug is handmade in New York by Recreation Center. These speckled stoneware mugs have a white glaze and black hand painted dots. They look beautiful when paired with the Dot Bowl and Raw Dot Mug also by Recreation Center. These pieces are dishwasher, microwave and food safe. Please allow for slight variation in shape and mark making as no two pieces are exactly alike. Mugs hold 12oz when filled to the very top.

name: Stripe Wren Dress
description: The Wren Wrap Dress is handmade by Rebe from Japanese cotton double gauze. This soft flowing wrap dress simply pulls over the head, wraps in back, and ties in front or back. Other details include a faux button at back neck and hidden front pockets. Model is shown wearing an XS dress.

name: Gray Penny Jumper
description:
The Penny Jumper is handmade by Rebe from cotton/linen. This apron inspired dress is meant to be layered over a top or a dress. It features criss cross straps, cotton denim pockets, and a tie in back. Other details include triangle cut-ins on the side and hand stitching across the yolk.

Model is wearing an XS Penny Jumper layered over the Lee Dress. The Lee Dress is sold separately.

name: Oatmeal Helen Dress
description:
The Helen Dress is handmade by Rebe from tan cotton linen with gray cotton linen pockets and contrast. This soft sculptural dress has a bubble shape, front pockets, a scooped neck, and a side zipper. Fabric has been pre-shrunk, simply machine wash and dry.

Model is wearing an XS dress over Morgan Culture Leggings. Leggings are sold separately.

name: Country Rose Dress
description:
The Rose Dress is handmade by Rebe from Japanese cottons. It is reminiscent of a patchwork quilt with it’s thoughtful pairings of patterned fabrics side by side. This sleeveless sundress slips over the head and ties in the back, making it an easy fit. It features two bucket pockets, contrast bias throughout, and is lovely worn alone or layered over a t-shirt, pants, or a skirt. 

Model is wearing a small dress over the Oscar Pants. Oscar Pants are sold separately.

name: Raw Dot Mug
description: Each Raw Dot Mug is handmade in New York by Recreation Center. These dark brown stoneware mugs have a white glazed interior with hand painted black dots. They look beautiful when paired with the Dot Mug and the Dot Bowl also by Recreation Center. These pieces are dishwasher, microwave and food safe. Please allow for slight variation in shape and mark making as no two pieces are exactly alike. Mugs hold 12oz when filled to the very top.

name: Dot Bowl
description: Each Dot Bowl is handmade in New York by Recreation Center. These speckled stoneware bowls have a white glaze and black hand painted dots.  They look beautiful when paired with the Dot Mug and Raw Dot Mug also by Recreation Center. These pieces are dishwasher, microwave and food safe. Please allow for slight variation in shape and mark making as no two pieces are exactly alike.

name: Navy Gingham Rose Dress
description:
The Rose Dress is handmade by Rebe from cotton navy gingham. This sundress slips over the head and ties in the back, making it an easy fit. It features two bucket pockets and is lovely worn alone or layered over a t-shirt, pants, or a skirt. 

Model is wearing a size small dress over the Oscar Pants. Oscar Pants are sold separately.

name: Charcoal Malta Vest
description:
The Malta Vest is handmade by Rebe from denim weight charcoal cotton with a contrast cotton lining. This sculptural pocket vest looks like a garment but functions like a bag. It features two large side pockets with a hidden zipper pocket on the left and a cell phone pocket on the right. The Malta vest buttons in the front across the the chest and is an amazing carry all.

Please note, the back image is of the Indigo Malta Vest. The Malta Vest is shown over the Rose Dress and Oscar Pants. Rose Dress and Oscar Pants are sold separately.

name: Nancy Jo Dress
description:
The Nancy Jo Dress is handmade by Rebe from Japanese cotton double gauze. It features hidden side pockets, a contrast placket, and a button in back. Simply machine wash cold and hang flat to dry

Model is wearing an XS over the Oscar Pant. Oscar Pant is sold separately.

name: Farm Bowl
description:
Each Farm Bowl is handmade in Brooklyn, New York by Nicholas Newcomb. These wonderfully simple handmade ceramics are reminiscent of a country home. They look beautiful when paired with the Camp Mug also by Nicholas Newcomb. 

Please allow for slight variation in shape and mark-making as no two pieces are exactly alike. Camp Mugs are offered with three different glazed trims, red, deep navy, and black. These pieces are dishwasher, microwave and food safe, although hand washing is preferred.

name: Abigail Dress
description:
The Abigail Dress is handmade by Rebe from black rayon with a cotton gingham double gauze contrast. This soft dress features a gathered front pocket, horizontal pleating across the chest, and darts in the back with elastic shearing. To care for your dress we suggest dry cleaning or hand washing in cold water.

Model is wearing a small Abigail Dress over Morgan Culture Leggings. Leggings are sold separately.

name: Camp Mugs
description:
Each Camp Mug is handmade in Brooklyn, New York by Nicholas Newcomb. These wonderfully simple handmade ceramics are reminiscent of a country home. They look beautiful when paired with the Farm Bowl also by Nicholas Newcomb.  Mugs hold 16oz when filled to the very top.

Please allow for slight variation in shape and mark-making as no two pieces are exactly alike. Camp Mugs are offered with three different glazed trims, red, deep navy, and black. These pieces are dishwasher, microwave and food safe, although hand washing is preferred.

name: Etta Dress
description:
The Etta dress is handmade by Rebe from cotton ikat. This wonderful jumper is perfect worn alone during the Spring and Summer months and layered underneath for Fall and Winter. It features two front pockets and layered fabric detailing at neckline. 

Model is wearing an XS dress over the Alma Dress and Chambray Barrow Skirt. Alma Dress and Barrow Skirt are sold separately.

name: Izzy Jumper
description:
The Izzy Jumper is made from a coral dotted tencil. This sweet ruffled dress features an adjustable tie across the chest, side pockets, and panels with shearing. Simply machine wash and hang to dry.

Model is wearing a small Izzy Jumper over the Alma Dress. The Alma Dress is sold separately.

name: Alma Dress
description:
The Alma Dress is handmade by Rebe from a hemp organic cotton knit. This soft dress was designed to be worn alone or layered over. It features hidden side pockets and 3/4 length sleeves. Fabric has been pre-shrunk, simply machine wash and dry.

Model is wearing a small dress over Morgan Culture Leggings. Leggings are sold separately.

name: Hatched Penny Jumper
description:
The Penny Jumper is handmade by Rebe from 100% canvas weight cotton. This apron inspired dress is meant to be layered over a top or a dress. It features criss cross straps, cotton denim pockets, and a tie in back. Other details include triangle cut-ins on the side and hand stitching across the yolk. 

Model is wearing an XS Penny Jumper layered over the Lee Dress and Oscar Pants. The Lee Dress and Oscar Pants are sold separately.

name: Sophia Dress
description:
The Sophia Dress is handmade by Rebe from shear cotton gauze. This elegant dress pulls over the head and features a circle skirt, fabric overlay detailing at neckline, and hidden side pockets.

Model is wearing an XS dress layered over the Winnie Bloomer Skirt. Winnie Bloomer Skirt is sold separately.

name: Lillian Tunic
description:
The Lillian Tunic is handmade by Rebe from a cotton/poly blend and was designed as a layering piece although it is beautiful worn alone. This sculptural dress features a stitched side pocket and asymmetrical draping that forms a nook for your hand.

Model is wearing a small Lillian Tunic over the Winnie Bloomer Skirt and Berre Blouse. Skirt and blouse are sold separately.

name: Winnie Bloomer Skirt
description:
The Winnie Bloomer Skirt is handmade by Rebe from Japanese Cotton. This special garment features a double gauze skirt with built in bloomers underneath made from natural pique. The wide waist band is made from a cotton/linen blend and fits comfortably on the hips. Other details include two front pockets, a side zipper and side buttons. This garment is beautiful worn alone or layered over. Fabric has been pre-shrunk, simply machine wash and dry.

Model is wearing a small skirt with the Berre Blouse. The Berre is sold separately.

name: Berre Blouse White
description: The Berre Blouse is handmade from 100% Japanese white cotton pique. This soft blouse features subtle pin-tuck detailing in front and back and ties at the neck.

name: Indigo Wren Dress
description:
The Wren Dress is handmade by Rebe from soft washed cotton/tencil indigo. This soft flowing wrap dress simply pulls over the head, wraps in back, and ties in front or back. Other details include a faux button at back neck and hidden front pockets. Fabric has been pre-shrunk, simply machine wash and dry.

Model is shown wearing an XS dress.

name: Indigo Helen Dress
description:
The Helen dress is handmade by Rebe from cotton and linen/tencil. This soft sculptural dress has a bubble shape, front pockets, a scooped neck, and a side zipper. Fabric has been pre-shrunk, simply machine wash and dry.

Model is wearing an XS dress over the Lee Dress and Oscar Pants. The Lee Dress and Oscar Pants are sold separately.

name: Oscar Pant
description:
The Oscar Pant is handmade by Rebe from cotton denim. These soft pants were designed to be layered on top of or worn alone. They feature a drop crotch, elastic waistband, and two front pockets. 
Simply machine wash and tumble dry.

name: Indigo Elaine Dress
description:
The Elaine Dress is elegant and simple with a fitted silhouette. It is made from cotton/tencil with an indigo wash and is fully lined with a soft pinstripe cotton. It has bound pockets in the side and a side zipper. Princess seams down the front give it a feminine shape and a line of buttons run thoughtfully down the back. Fabric has been pre-shrunk, simply machine wash and dry.

Model is wearing an XS dress layered over the Oscar Pants. The Oscar Pants are sold separately.

name: Blue Peyton Sweater
description:
The Peyton Sweater is machine knit from 100% Italian cotton. It features a single contrast pocket, drop shoulders, outside seams, and recycled glass buttons. This beautiful cardigan is lovingly made in Los Angeles, CA and was deigned by Rebe to keep you looking sweet and feeling warm.

Size 1 fits: XS, S & M 
Size 2 fits M, L & XL

name: Oatmeal Peyton Sweater
description:
The Peyton Sweater is machine knit from 100% Italian cotton. It features a single contrast pocket, drop shoulders, outside seams, and recycled glass buttons. This beautiful cardigan is lovingly made in Los Angeles, CA and was deigned by Rebe to keep you looking sweet and feeling warm.

Size 1 fits: XS, S & M 
Size 2 fits M, L & XL

name: Morgan Culture Leggings
description:
Each pair of hand-painted nylon leggings is handmade in Los Angeles exclusively for Specks & Keepings. Dots may vary as they are all hand painted. Please allow two weeks for your leggings to be made special for you.

Available in two sizes:
One size fits most and XL

name: Shapes Irene Dress
description:
This lovely sundress is handmade by Rebe from organic cotton knit. The fabric was designed by Feral Childe. Free of pockets, it pulls over the head, lays smoothly at the hips and cinches at the waist with a drawstring. Available in blue shapes or adobe shapes.

Shown layered over Morgan Culture Leggings. Leggings are sold separately.

name: Yellow Lee Dress
description:
The Lee Dress is handmade by Rebe from 100% cotton double knit. This soft knit dress features a scoop neck, cap sleeves, a gathered pocket, and contrast detailing on bottom. The Lee Dress is a perfect layering jumper. Wear it alone or layer it under your favorite pieces come Fall and Winter. Simply machine wash your dress and lay it flat to dry.

Shown on model with the Susan Scarf and Morgan Culture Leggings. Scarf and leggings are sold separately.

name: Triangle Amelia Dress
description:
The Amelia Dress is handmade by Rebe from a printed organic cotton designed by Feral Childe. This soft summer dress features a side zipper, front pockets and contrast pleats. Please note, the skirt is not lined. The Amelia Dress is available in blue or adobe.

Model is wearing an XS dress layered over the Sadie Skirt. The Sadie Skirt is sold separately.

name: Plaid Berenice Dress
description:
The Berenice Dress is handmade by Rebe. This soft plaid cotton dress has contrast check stripes that run down the bodice with small contrast detailing at the cuff and hem. The Berenice Dress features two front pockets, 3/4 length sleeves, gathers at neckline and pleats in back. 

Shown layered over the Dorothy Skirt. The Dorothy Skirt is sold separately.

name: Delilah Apron
description:
This sweet Japanese cotton apron is handmade by Rebe and is designed to look like a jumper. It has four pockets, including an inside contrast cell phone pocket and the straps criss cross in back leaving the neck free of pressure. 

Available in one size.

name: Orange Check Rachelle Dress
description:
The Rachelle Dress is handmade by Rebe from orange check rayon. This elegant dress features a shaped neckline, soft gathers at bust, and a long fitted waistline. Side pockets and a contrast bias at hem are small touches that make the Rachelle Dress functional and formal. Delicate fabric belt sold separately.

The Rachelle Dress is also available in black.

name: Floral Florence Dress
description:
This Florence Dress is handmade by Rebe from floral printed silk designed by Feral Childe. This lovely dress features pleats in the front and back of the bodice, elbow length sleeves, side pockets, and a side zipper. Hand stitched detailing at the neckline of each Florence Dress is a sweet touch. 

Shown layered over the Midnight Barrows Skirt. Barrows Skirt is sold separately. Please allow two weeks for your dress to be made special for you.

name: Blue Ethel Dress
description: The Ethel Dress by Rebe is handmade from 100% dotted sky blue cotton with a red check tencil contrast in pocket. It features semi circle gathers at left hip, soft pleat detailing in front & back, and an exterior pocket with a small built in cell phone pocket inside. This sweet, easy to fit dress slips over the head, is fully lined, and ties at the waist.

name: Fiona Blouse
description: The Fiona Blouse is handmade by Rebe from silk that was designed by Feral Childe. It pulls over the head, making it an easy fit, with decorative button detailing down the back. The Fiona Blouse is cut loose. The model is shown wearing a small with the Sadie Skirt.

name: Midnight Barrow Skirt
description: The Midnight Barrow Skirt is handmade by Feral Childe. This soft cupro skirt has a wide elastic waistband making it comfortable to wear at the hips or the waist. Puckered pleat detailing at front bottom hem and side pockets make the Barrows skirt playful and practical. This lovely skirt is beautiful worn or layered under dresses.

name: Dorothy Skirt
description: This embroidered cotton skirt is lovely worn alone or layered underneath your favorite dress. It features a wide waistband, side pocket and side zipper.

name: Chambray Barrow Skirt
description: The Barrow Skirt is handmade by Feral Childe. This soft cupro skirt has a wide elastic waistband making it comfortable to wear at the hips or the waist. Puckered pleat detailing at front bottom hem and side pockets make the Barrows skirt playful and practical. This lovely skirt is beautiful worn or layered under dresses.

name: Berenice Brown Dress
description:
The Berenice Dress is handmade by Rebe. This linen and rayon dress has contrast check tencil stripes that run down the bodice with small contrast details at the cuff and hem. The Berenice Dress features two front pockets, gathers at neckline, and comes with the belt shown. 

Shown on model over the Barrows Skirt. Barrows sold separately.

name: Maddy Dress Blue
description:
This apron inspired dress is made from Japanese printed linen. It features two front pockets and back button detailing. It has wide arm holes, and is designed to be worn over a camisole or a dress. 

Shown on model over the Barrows Skirt. Barrows skirt is not included.

name: Mona Dress Brown
description:
The Mona Dress is handmade by Rebe from a blend of fabrics: rayon, cotton & silk. It has a wide neckline, a semi-high gathered waist, hidden side pockets, and a side zip. Cotton and silk asymmetrical patchwork piecing adorns the front and back neckline. Each Mona Dress is handmade by Rebe from small runs of fabric. 

XS: 34” chest x 32” waist x 54” hip x 37.5” long  
S: 36” chest x 32.5” waist x 56” hip x 39” long  
M: 37” chest x 34” waist x 57” hip x 40.5” long 
 L: 38” chest x 35” waist x 60” hip x 42” long

name: Elsa Dress
description:
The Elsa Dress is elegant and simple with a fitted silhouette. It is made from a red check cotton/ linen  blend with a cotton check contrast, has cap sleeves, welt pockets, and a side zip. Princess seams down the front giving it a feminine shape and a line of buttons run thoughtfully down the back atop a red checked placket. Each Elsa Dress is handmade by Rebe from small runs of fabric.

XS: 31.5” chest x 28” waist x 44” hip x 43” long 
S: 33.5” chest x 30” waist x 45” hip x 44” long 
M: 36” chest x 32” waist x 46.5” hip x 44.5” long 
L: 38” chest x 34” waist x 48” hip x 44.5” long

name: Gray Pinstripe Ethel Dress
description: The Ethel Dress  is handmade by Rebe from 100% gray pinstripe organic cotton with a midnight check lining. It features a semi circle that gathers at left hip, soft pleat detailing in front and back, and an exterior pocket with a small built in cell phone pocket inside. This sweet, easy to fit dress slips over the head, is fully lined, and ties at the waist.

name: Berenice Dress Short Sleeve
description: The Berenice Dress is handmade by Rebe. This 100% cotton dress has contrast brown stripes that run down the bodice with small contrast details at the cuff and hem. The Berenice Dress features two front pockets, gathers at neckline, and comes with the belt shown.

name: Elaine Dress Brown
description: The Elaine Dress is elegant and simple with a fitted silhouette. It is made from 100% cotton and is fully lined with a pinstripe organic cotton. It has side pockets, a side zip, and welt pockets. Princess seams down the front give it a feminine shape and a line of buttons run thoughtfully down the back.

name: Pyramid Pullover
description: The Pyramid Pullover is made from 100% extra fine Italian Merino Wool. This sightly cropped nude sweater has beautiful pyramid pattern detailing throughout and burgundy lace-like detailing at neckline. This sweater runs a bit oversized making it easy to fit.

name: Peyton Sweater Wool
description:
The Peyton Sweater is machine knit from 100% Italian wool. It features a single contrast pocket, drop shoulders, outside seams, and recycled glass buttons. This beautiful cardigan is lovingly made in Los Angeles, CA and was deigned by Rebe to keep you looking sweet and feeling warm. 

Available in chestnut, black, rust & burgundy.

Size 1 fits: XS, S & M 
Size 2 fits M, L & XL

name: Paola Sweater Gray
description:
The Paola Sweater is designed by Rebe and is thoughtfully machine knitted in Los Angeles, CA. This Elegant sweater is made from Italian merino wool. It features princess seams, side pockets, and button detailing inside & out. The Paola Sweater has a fitted contour, but is generous in size. This beautiful sweater is designed to last many years and is shown here in gray with a brown contrast and gray with a black contrast.

The Paola Sweater Gray is available in two color ways: Gray/ Brown and Gray/ Black

name: Paola Sweater Brown
description:
The Paola Sweater is designed by Rebe and is thoughtfully machine knitted in Los Angeles, CA. This Elegant sweater is made from Italian merino wool. It features princess seams, side pockets, and button detailing inside & out. The Paola Sweater has a fitted contour, but is generous in size. This beautiful sweater is designed to last many years and is shown here in brown with a dark brown contrast.

The Paola Sweater Brown is available in two color ways: Brown/ Brown and Brown/ Black

name: Paola Sweater Rust
description: The Paola Sweater is designed by Rebe and is thoughtfully machine knitted in Los Angeles, CA. This Elegant sweater is made from Italian merino wool. It features princess seams, side pockets, and button detailing inside & out. The Paola Sweater has a fitted contour, but is generous in size. This beautiful sweater is designed to last many years and is shown here in rust with burgundy trim.

name: Madeline Coat Gray
description:
The Madeline Coat is handmade by Rebe from hemp/ organic cotton. This whimsical overcoat is both warm and soft It features semi circle pockets with a built in contrast check cell phone pocket, large covered buttons, and pleats at wrist. The Madeline Coat is available in four colors: navy, red, chestnut, and gray.

Please note, the image shown of the back of the coat features the Red Madeline Coat.

name: Madeline Coat Red
description:
The Madeline Coat is handmade by Rebe from hemp/ organic cotton. This whimsical overcoat is both warm and soft It features semi circle pockets with a built in contrast check cell phone pocket, large covered buttons, and pleats at wrist. The Madeline Coat is available in four colors: navy, red, chestnut, and gray. 

Please note, the close-up pocket detail features the Madeline Coat in Chestnut.

name: Madeline Coat Navy
description:
The Madeline Coat is handmade by Rebe from hemp/ organic cotton. This whimsical overcoat is both warm and soft It features semi circle pockets with a built in contrast check cell phone pocket, large covered buttons, and pleats at wrist. The Madeline Coat is available in four colors: navy, red, chestnut, and gray. 

Please note, the image shown of the back of the coat features the Red Madeline Coat.

name: Madeline Coat Chestnut
description: The Madeline Coat is handmade by Rebe from hemp/organic cotton. This whimsical overcoat is both warm and soft It features semi circle pockets with a built in contrast check cell phone pocket, large covered buttons, and pleats at wrist. The Madeline Coat is available in four colors: navy, red, chestnut and gray.

name: Fanny Raincoat
description:
The Fanny Raincoat is made from waxed cotton and is fully lined with flannel. It keeps you very warm and dry and features two large bucket pockets, an asymmetrical contrast zipper, button closure detailing at collar, an oversized hood and pleats in back. The Fanny Raincoat is perfect for traveling as is scrunches small. Please note that the plaid flannel color may vary from what is shown.

More colors and sizes coming, please email for details.

name: Matilda Sac with Teal Kasuri Cloth
description:
The Matilda Sac is a half-moon shaped bag with a zipper closure, two pleated contrast front pockets, and a sleek pocket in the back. It is lined with oil cloth and has a large pocket divider inside.

This Matilda Sac is handmade by Rebe from black and white french cotton jacquard with a coral dot contrast and teal kasuri cloth pockets in front. This large sac makes a wonderful overnight bag and a beautiful carry all. Please note that the pattern on the front pockets will vary slightly as some have more pattern and others less.

19" wide x 13" high x 3.5" deep x 6" deep at bottom. Handles measure 15" high x 1.25" wide

name: Matilda Sac with Navy Kasuri Cloth
description:
The Matilda Sac is a half-moon shaped bag with a zipper closure, two pleated contrast front pockets, and a sleek pocket in the back. It is lined with oil cloth and has a large pocket divider inside.

This Matilda Sac is handmade by Rebe from black and white french cotton jacquard with a coral dot contrast and navy kasuri cloth pockets in front. This large sac makes a wonderful overnight bag and a beautiful carry all. Please note that the pattern on the front pockets will vary slightly as some have more pattern and others less.

19" wide x 13" high x 3.5" deep x 6" deep at bottom. Handles measure 15" high x 1.25" wide

name: Matilda Sac with Marimekko Cloth
description:
The Matilda Sac is a half-moon shaped bag with a zipper closure, two pleated contrast front pockets, and a sleek pocket in the back. It is lined with oil cloth and has a large pocket divider inside.

This Matilda Sac is handmade by Rebe from black and white french cotton jacquard with a coral dot contrast and marimekko cloth pockets in front. This large sac makes a wonderful overnight bag and a beautiful carry all. Please note that the pattern on the front pockets will vary slightly as some have more pattern and others less.

19" wide x 13" high x 3.5" deep x 6" deep at bottom. Handles measure 15" high x 1.25" wide

name: Red Matilda Sac
description:
The Matilda Sac is a half-moon shaped bag with a zipper closure, two pleated contrast front pockets, and a sleek pocket in the back. It is lined with oil cloth and has a large pocket divider inside. 

This Matilda Sac is handmade by Rebe from vintage Ralli cloth and collected fabrics. This large sac makes a wonderful overnight bag and a beautiful carry all. Pockets may vary from what is pictured as no two are exactly alike.

19" wide x 13" high x 3.5" deep x 6" deep at bottom 
Handles measure 15" high x 1.25" wide

name: Black & Cream Matilda Sac
description:
The Matilda Sac is a half-moon shaped bag with a zipper closure, two pleated contrast front pockets, and a sleek pocket in the back. It is lined with oil cloth and has a large pocket divider inside.

This Matilda Sac is handmade by Rebe from vintage Ralli cloth and collected fabrics. This large sac makes a wonderful overnight bag and a beautiful carry all. Pockets may vary from what is pictured as no two bags are exactly alike.

19" wide x 13" high x 3.5" deep x 6" deep at bottom 
Handles measure 15" high x 1.25" wide

name: Quilted Clutch
description: Each Quilted Clutch is handmade by Natalie Ebaugh from cotton fabric quilted with poly batting. No two pieces are exactly alike. These special pouches are thoughtfully made in Oakland, California. Natalie is inspired by the interaction and vibration that happens when textiles, textures, color and prints are mixed together. To care for your clutch, simply hand wash cold and hang or lay flat to dry.

name: Quilted Tote
description: Each Quilted Tote is handmade by Natalie Ebaugh from cotton fabric quilted with poly batting and cotton webbing straps. These shaped totes are thoughtfully made in Oakland, California. Natalie is inspired by the interaction and vibration that happens when textiles, textures, color and prints are mixed together. She creates beautiful everyday objects that challenge the imagination. No two pieces are exactly the same. To care for your tote, simply hand wash cold and hang or lay flat to dry.

name: Middle English Flat
description:
These leather flats are thoughtfully made in New York by Aurora Shoe Co., where they use American made materials and assemble all of their shoes in house and by hand.

Middle English Flats are available in women's sizes, in olive with a burgundy strap. We strongly recommend tracing your foot for the most accurate sizing. 

Email us at info@specksandkeepings.com about having your shoes custom made for you. Please allow a week for your shoes to be made special for you. 

If you have questions about sizing and width or would like to order men's sizes, email us, we can help.

name: West Indian Flat
description:
These leather flats are thoughtfully made in New York by Aurora Shoe Co., where they use American made materials and assemble all of their shoes in house and by hand. 

The West Indian Flat is a t-strap style shoe. It features a simple rounded toe, an adjustable ankle strap with a brass buckle, and minimal stitching. These flats pair well with socks or tights in Winter and bare feet in summer. The breathable full grain leather upper and leather insole will stretch and mold to your feet for a custom fit with wear.

Available in women's sizes, in black with a brown strap. We strongly recommend tracing your foot for the most accurate sizing.

Email us at info@specksandkeepings.com about having your shoes custom made for you. Please allow a week for your shoes to be made special for you. If you have questions about sizing and width or would like to order men's sizes, email us, we can help.

name: New Mexican Sandal Black
description:
These simple leather sandals are thoughtfully made in New York by Aurora Shoe Co., where they use American made materials and assemble all of their shoes in house and by hand. 

Sandals are available in women's sizes, in black with a brown strap. We strongly recommend tracing your foot for the most accurate sizing. 

Please allow a week for your sandals to be made for you. If you have questions about size or width do email us, we can help.

name: New Mexican Sandal Burgundy
description:
These simple leather sandals are thoughtfully made in New York by Aurora Shoe Co., where they use American made materials and assemble all of their shoes in house and by hand. 

Sandals are available in women's sizes in burgundy with a navy strap. We strongly recommend tracing your foot for the most accurate sizing.

Please allow a week for your sandals to be made for you. If you have questions about size or width do email us, we can help.

name: Spot Scarf
description:
Each hand dyed and block printed silk scarf is handmade by Susan Eastman in Oakland, California. These beautifully crafted scarves add a perfect touch of color to any look. Colors may vary slightly as each scarf is made by hand. Please allow up to two weeks for your scarf to be made special for you.

Scarves measure approximately 10"x55"

name: Children's Turkish Slippers
description:
Each pair of Turkish slippers was hand knit and selected especially for the shop. These one of a kind slippers will keep your feet toasty all Winter long. Slippers stretch, making them an easy fit. To order, simply measure your child's feet.

Children's slippers measure approx. 8.5"long. Amount of stretch varies from 1" - 2" depending on yarn.

name: Kids Socks, XS
description:
Each pair of children's Turkish socks was hand knit and selected especially for the shop. These one of a kind socks will keep your little one’s feet cozy all year long. Socks have a bit of stretch, making them an easy fit. To order, simply measure your child’s feet.

Measure 6" - 7" long

name: Kids Socks, Small
description:
Each pair of children's Turkish socks was hand knit and selected especially for the shop. These one of a kind socks will keep your little one’s feet cozy all year long. Socks have a bit of stretch, making them an easy fit. To order, simply measure your child’s feet.

Measure 8"long

name: Women's Turkish Slippers
description: Each pair of Turkish slippers was hand knit and selected especially for the shop. These one of a kind slippers will keep your feet toasty all Winter long. Slippers stretch to fit women's size 8 and smaller.

name: Camel, Bear & Sheep Mobile
description: This one-of-a-kind mobile is hand embroidered on 100% white linen by Hillery Sproatt. A sheep sits atop a bear that is resting on a camel, all of which are strung beneath a double sided embroidered rock.

name: Gods Eye Mobile
description:
This one of a kind mobile has four  objects strung from the tips of two applewood sticks. The sticks are joined to make a gods eye. Tear drops, flowers and embroidered birds dance above your head bringing joy to your home.

Mobiles are made with care by Hillery Sproatt from vintage fabrics and cutting room scraps. Fabrics and details vary. Your mobile will look different from the one pictured.

8” x 8” wide x 7” - 18” long

name: Stick Macrame
description: Debra Weiss has a very special sense of intuitive picture making. This one-of-a-kind stick macrame is made from hand knotted waxed nylon. It is made to hang on the wall like a drawing or painting.

name: Bright Floral Stitching
description: Debra Weiss has a very special sense of intuitive picture making. She draws upon her background in textiles and years of macrame work when making her wonderful collaged fabric works. Carefully selected fabrics from Debra's extensive collection of silks and vintage scarves are layered one upon another. The fabrics are then hand stitched together over weeks and sometimes months. The backs are as beautiful as the fronts. Macrame detailing is added like lace work. Each stitching is one of a kind and they are meant to be showcased on a wall, like a drawing or painting.

name: Soft Floral Stitching
description: Debra Weiss has a very special sense of intuitive picture making. She draws upon her background in textiles and years of macrame work when making her wonderful collaged fabric works. Carefully selected fabrics from Debra's extensive collection of silks and vintage scarves are layered one upon another. The fabrics are then hand stitched together over weeks and sometimes months. The backs are as beautiful as the fronts. Macrame detailing is added like lace work. Each stitching is one of a kind and they are meant to be showcased on a wall, like a drawing or painting.

name: Macrame Plant Hangers
description: Debra Weiss' macrame plant hangers are a lovely addition to any space. Each piece is handmade so no two are exactly alike.

name: Black Walnut Ink
description:
Draw with a bit of Earth. Each jar of black walnut ink is made entirely from black walnuts in Grand Rapids, MI. Every jar is made with care by Kotoa and comes branded with a hand screenprinted sticker. These homemade inks are such lovely little objects and a fantastic drawing medium. 

Each jar of ink is approximately 1oz or 30ml, and can last a very long time.

name: Sweet Mats
description:
Going for a picnic or having a small snack with tea? These handmade sweet mats by Kotoa let you enjoy a treat anywhere. A small placemat and napkin in one, the sweet mat keeps your food off dirty surfaces, while looking lovely. Roll it up and keep it in your lunch sac or lay a few out on the table for a bite of dessert.

Each sweet mat is hand embroidered and has a bit of soft blue lace on its edge, so no two are exactly alike. They come in sets of two, one for you and one for a friend. 

8.5" wide x 6.5“ long

name: Dot Napkins
description:
These handmade cloth napkins by Rebe dress up any meal. They are wonderful for picnics as well. Keep one in your lunch sac and never be stuck with a mess.

Each set comes with four dot napkins.
15.5" x 13.5“

name: Lunch Sac
description:
This lunch sac is so sweet no one will guess you are toting your lunch. Each lunch sac is handmade by Rebe and is lined with oil cloth, has a velcro closure, and two side pockets for your napkin or silverware. The sac is tall enough to fit most water bottles and wide enough to hold a tupperware of your favorite leftovers. They are perfect for the little one's lunches as well. Please allow for variation in lunchbox contrast fabrics, as each lunch sac is one of a kind. The ones in currently in stock have a red and white stripe fabric for the side contrast.

8" wide x 3“ deep x 12“ high

name: Paula Pocket
description:
The Paula Pocket is designed to be worn across the body and fit only the essentials, leaving your hands free when wandering the town. This sac has an outside pocket and two inside pockets that zip closed so you can keep your valuables close to your body. Each Paula Pocket is handmade by Rebe from 100% organic Japanese cotton and cutting room scraps. No two are exactly alike.

29" long x 10" wide (on the front and back)

name: Linen Pouch
description:
These hand embroidered linen pouches are beautiful and practical. They are handmade by Kristin of New House Project with a zip closure and are fully lined. Each pouch features a one of a kind aztec-like geometric embroidery on the front. Pouches are sold assorted and no two are exactly alike. Yours will be a wonderful surprise. 

Measures approx. 6” x 4.5"

name: Braided Spiral Pouch
description:
These braided pouches, although designed to hold little treasures, are a bit like treasure themselves. They make a lovely carry all for your favorite bits. Each pouch is made from collected yarn and lined with salvaged silk, polyester, or rayon. They have a zipper closure and a small Anschtecka braided loop inside. Each piece is carefully made by hand so no two are ever the same. Pouches are sold assorted, so yours will be a wonderful surprise.

Approx. 5.34" in diameter x 3" tall

name: Circle Bag
description:
Handmade leather circle bag by Cydwoq. Thoughtfully made in California.

9"w x 8.5"h x 2"d

name: Anschtecka Backpacks
description:
These handmade backpacks by Anschtecka are functional sculptures made from all reclaimed materials, things that were once another. Each backpack has a history and tells a story through the careful pairings of materials old and found. These backpacks are beautiful reminders that we can breathe life into abandoned things with a little love and care. Each backpack is carefully made by hand so no two are ever alike. 

The Floral Flock Backpack is made from salvaged fabric & textiles, and collected used buttons from a flea market in Berlin. It has button and zipper closures.
Measures 19" from top to bottom x 12" across
Straps extend up to 20" & adjust with button closures 

The Umbrella Backpack is made from an umbrella, salvaged fabric & textiles, and collected used buttons. Features button closures and snap closures on small front pocket.
Measures 20" from top to bottom x 11" across
Straps extend up to 28" and adjust with button closures

name: Anschtecka Sacks
description:
These handmade backpacks by Anschtecka are functional sculptures made from all reclaimed materials, things that were once another. Each backpack has a history and tells a story through the careful pairings of materials old and found. These backpacks are beautiful reminders that we can breathe life into abandoned things with a little love and care. Each backpack is carefully made by hand so no two are ever alike.

The Spattered Sack is made from decorative lawn flags, buttons from artist's collection, and a used zipper. The back of this sack is as eye catching as the front, with it’s red and gray geometric pattern. Padding throughout the back and adjustable straps make this sack comfortable for wearing all day and many of the fabrics used to make this sac hold up well to wet conditions. Measures 15" from top to bottom x 15.5" across. Straps extend up to19.5" and adjust with button closures.

The Painted Pack is made from a re-purposed acrylic painting on acrylic fabric, curtains, buttons from artist's collection, and a used zipper. The lining is made from painting rags. Look carefully and you’ll notice a hidden pocket in the back side. Padding throughout the back and adjustable straps make this pack comfortable for wearing all day. Measures 17" from top to bottom x 15" across . Straps extend up to 18" and are 2’ wide and adjust with button closures.

name: Beaded Face Necklaces
description: These wonderful hand-beaded face necklaces by Kitt Repass make you smile. Each piece is one of a kind, so no two are ever exactly alike. Add a bit a whimsy to your life...

name: Macrame Pins
description:
Debra Weiss has a very special sense of intuitive picture making. These one-of-a-kind macrame pins are made from hand knotted waxed nylon and Japanese threads. They seem like miniature drawings or paintings. Wear them or hand them in your home.

1" x 1.5"

name: Reflectors
description:
Don't be left in the dark. Be safe and stand out when you wear your handmade reflector pin by Anschtecka. These are perfect for a backpack or coat. Reflectors are sold assorted, so yours will be a surprise. 

Small 2"x 1"
Large 4"-5"

name: Sequin Splash Pins
description:
A bitty pin for days when you need a little sparkle. The Sequin Splash Pin is a perfect addition to your favorite dress or an old top.  Each pin is a wearable soft collage handmade by Anschtecka from fabric bits, collected and salvaged beads, and found pieces. Each piece is carefully made by hand so no two are alike.

Sizes do vary from piece to piece
1.5"- 2" long x .75"- 1" high

name: Braided Sprial Pins
description:
These braided spiral pins make a beautiful addition to any garment. They are reminiscent of braided rugs beneath rocking chairs. Each pin is a wonderful miniature object made by Anschtecka with the utmost of care from scraps of threads lost and left behind. No two are ever alike as each piece is hand braided from salvaged threads gathered from frayed textiles and the sewing machine. Pins are sold assorted so yours will be a beautiful surprise.

2.75" across

name: Bead & Stick Necklace
description:
This handmade necklace by Anschtecka is made with collected beads and nylon thread. It is both feminine and masculine and was made with a strong woman in mind. 

15.5" long
Pendant 2.75" long

name: Silkess Necklace
description:
This elegant handmade necklace by Anschtecka is made from salvaged silk, and beads from a salvaged vintage necklace. It reminds me of a ballet dancer with it’s sheer softness and subtle curves as it lays just so on the neck. 

6" long segment of synthetic pearls
12" long

name: Braided Necklace
description:
These braided necklaces are a bit like collars as they make a lovely addition to any neckline. Each Anschtecka necklace is handmade from braided embroidery floss and lined with salvaged lace. They slip over the head and can also be worn as a headband; they are a snug fit over the head. Each piece is carefully made by hand so no two are exactly the same. Necklaces are sold assorted, so yours will be a wonderful surprise. 

Approx. 8" in diameter with a slight bit of stretch

name: Macrame Necklaces
description: Debra Weiss' macrame necklaces are made from wax cotton. These beautiful hand knotted necklaces have front and back detailing and pull right over your head. They make a lovely addition to any look. Each piece is handmade so no two are exactly alike.

name: Hand-Knotted Necklace Trio
description:
Each collection of hand-knotted necklaces is lovingly made by Sheena Callage in Baltimore, Maryland from embroidery floss and metal scraps. Groupings of metal bolts and washers hang from colorful strands, which are bound together in back with a piece of hand sewn leather. Necklaces are sold assorted as no two are exactly alike.

Measures approx. 14.5” long

name: Hand-Knotted Necklace
description:
Groupings of metal bolts and washers hang from a colorful hand-knotted strand. Each one of a kind hand knotted necklace is thoughtfully made by Sheena Callage in Baltimore, Maryland from embroidery floss and metal scraps and is hand bound in back with leather. Thin and thick necklaces are sold assorted as no two are exactly alike. 

Measures approx. 15” long

name: Eye Glass Strands
description:
These multi colored hand-knotted eyeglass strands are the perfect glasses accessory. Each one of a kind strand is handmade by Sheena Callage in Baltimore, Maryland from embroidery floss. Strands sold assorted as no two are exactly alike.

Measures approx. 28” long

name: Clay Necklaces
description: Each Clay Necklace is carefully hand sculpted from polymer clay by Natalie Ebaugh so no two are ever exactly alike. Pairing colors and forms in unexpected ways, Natalie makes playful sculpture that is both wearable and absurd. These collections of sculpted forms that dangle from each necklace are reminiscent of colored rocks, painted desserts, and stalactites.

name: Cave Claw Necklace
description: Each Cave Claw Necklace is carefully hand sculpted from polymer clay by Natalie Ebaugh so no two are ever exactly alike. Pairing colors and forms in unexpected ways, Natalie makes playful sculpture that is both wearable and absurd. These collections of sculpted forms that dangle from each necklace are reminiscent of colored rocks, painted desserts, and stalactites. Pick your favorite color, wear & enjoy.

name: Ceramic Necklace
description: Each ceramic necklace is a collection of delicate handmade glazed ceramic beads made by Jessica Hans.The beads are thoughtfully strung together on braided wool and cotton yarn and each necklace is one-of-a-kind. Necklaces are sold assorted, your's will be a beautiful surprise.

name: Textured Porcelain Pot
description: This one-of-a-kind hand painted & glazed porcelain pot is handmade by Jessica Hans in her studio in Baltimore, Maryland. This textured art object is reminiscent of both a painters palette and waves. Made to be filled with something lovely and left out for all to admire.

name: Painted Pot
description: This one-of-a-kind hand painted & glazed porcelain pot is handmade by Jessica Hans in her studio in Baltimore, Maryland. This textured art object is reminiscent of cave paintings with it's simple mark making. Made to be filled with something lovely and left out for all to admire.

name: Painted Wall Drawings
description:
Painted Wall Drawings are made from paper, acrylic paint, ink, on wood panel, and archival varnish. Each drawing is a one-of-a-kind original so colors, sizes, and shapes do vary. 

Throughout the Drabby Nook Collection, David Ubias distorts perception, explores weight, re-discovers wood, and manipulates both soft and hard materials to reference organic blobs, creatures, and furniture. With a focus on craftsmanship, whimsy, and multi-function each Drabby Nook sculpture will live differently in your space and is sure to provide a lifetime of play. Each art object is thoughtfully handmade so no two are exactly alike.

name: Car In Half
description:
Car In Half is made from geode/paper pulp (made from discard books), glue, acryla-gouache, and archival varnish. Turn the pieces on their sides and they reference many different forms. A sculpture made for all to enjoy.

Throughout the Drabby Nook Collection, David Ubias distorts perception, explores weight, re-discovers wood, and manipulates both soft and hard materials to reference organic blobs, creatures, and furniture. With a focus on craftsmanship, whimsy, and multi-function each Drabby Nook sculpture will live differently in your space and is sure to provide a lifetime of play. Each art object is thoughtfully handmade so no two are exactly alike.

name: Algea Sculptures
description:
These Algae Sculptures are made from bi-hydras/ paper pulp (made from discarded books), latex and acrylic paint, wood, and glue. They are beautiful when shown as a collection on both a surface or a wall.

Throughout the Drabby Nook Collection, David Ubias distorts perception, explores weight, re-discovers wood, and manipulates both soft and hard materials to reference organic blobs, creatures, and furniture. With a focus on craftsmanship, whimsy, and multi-function each Drabby Nook sculpture will live differently in your space and is sure to provide a lifetime of play. Each art object is thoughtfully handmade so no two are exactly alike.

name: Woodgrain Bookends
description:
These bookends are made from foibles/ reclaimed wood, acrylic paint, finishing wax, and archival varnish. They are sold as a set and are made for all to enjoy.

Throughout the Drabby Nook Collection, David Ubias distorts perception, explores weight, re-discovers wood, and manipulates both soft and hard materials to reference organic blobs, creatures, and furniture. With a focus on craftsmanship, whimsy, and multi-function each Drabby Nook sculpture will live differently in your space and is sure to provide a lifetime of play. Each art object is thoughtfully handmade so no two are exactly alike.

name: Lounge Chair
description:
Lounge Chair is made from canvas, acrylic paint, brass screws, wood, woodstain, and polyurethane. This sculpture is one of a kind and was made in Baltimore, Maryland.

Throughout the Drabby Nook Collection, David Ubias distorts perception, explores weight, re-discovers wood, and manipulates both soft and hard materials to reference organic blobs, creatures, and furniture. With a focus on craftsmanship, whimsy, and multi-function each Drabby Nook sculpture will live differently in your space and is sure to provide a lifetime of play. Each art object is thoughtfully handmade so no two are exactly alike.

18" long x 6" tall x 4" wide

name: Miniature Saw Horses
description:
These Miniature Saw Horses are made from trestle/ wood and polyurethane. They hold and display objects beautifully.

Throughout the Drabby Nook Collection, David Ubias distorts perception, explores weight, re-discovers wood, and manipulates both soft and hard materials to reference organic blobs, creatures, and furniture. With a focus on craftsmanship, whimsy, and multi-function each Drabby Nook sculpture will live differently in your space and is sure to provide a lifetime of play. Each art object is thoughtfully handmade so no two are exactly alike.

name: Wooden Pedestal Boxes
description:
These Wooden Pedestal Boxes are made from birch plywood, acrylic paint,  and polyurethane. Originally made to hold, stack, and display small sculptures from the Drabby Nook Collection, these multi-functional objects are truly made to be used however you desire. 

Throughout the Drabby Nook Collection, David Ubias distorts perception, explores weight, re-discovers wood, and manipulates both soft and hard materials to reference organic blobs, creatures, and furniture. With a focus on craftsmanship, whimsy, and multi-function each Drabby Nook sculpture will live differently in your space and is sure to provide a lifetime of play. Each art object is thoughtfully handmade so no two are exactly alike.

name: Pulp Sculpture
description:
This one-of-a-kind pulp sculpture is made of paper pulp from discarded books, glue, and archival varnish. It is shown here on a handmade pedestal box. 

Throughout the Drabby Nook Collection, David Ubias distorts perception, explores weight, re-discovers wood, and manipulates both soft and hard materials to reference organic blobs, creatures, and furniture. With a focus on craftsmanship, whimsy, and multi-function each Drabby Nook sculpture will live differently in your space and is sure to provide a lifetime of play. Each art object is thoughtfully handmade so no two are exactly alike.

7" x 4" x 3.5"

name: Collection of Bitty Nooks
description:
This collection of small Bitty Nook sculptures is sold as a set and is made to be played with. These painted wood and paper objects are especially interesting when paired with other sculptures from the Drabby Nook Collection. We encourage you to arrange and rearrange...

Throughout the Drabby Nook Collection, David Ubias distorts perception, explores weight, re-discovers wood, and manipulates both soft and hard materials to reference organic blobs, creatures, and furniture. With a focus on craftsmanship, whimsy, and multi-function each Drabby Nook sculpture will live differently in your space and is sure to provide a lifetime of play. Each art object is thoughtfully handmade so no two are exactly alike.

name: Horse Mobile
description:
Each one-of-a-kind Horse Mobile is hand sewn and embroidered. A horse hangs beneath a bear and a rabbit, all of which are strung beneath a double sided embroidered rock.

Mobiles are made with care by Hillery Sproatt from vintage fabrics and cutting room scraps. Fabrics and details vary. Your mobile may look different from the one pictured.

name: $25 Gift Certificate
description:
Specks & Keepings gift certificates are thoughtful gifts all year round. Give a Specks & Keepings gift certificate to someone special in your life. They can browse the shop themselves and find something they love!

After ordering your gift certificate, email me at info@specksandkeepings.com
Please include:
-Your name
-The name of the person receiving the gift 
-A short message

Personalized gift certificates are emailed to you in pdf form and printed certificates are mailed upon request only.
